quote: Fail I alone, in words and deeds? Why, all men strive and who succeeds?
author: Robert Browning

quote: The strong man is strongest when alone.
author: Friedrich Schiller

quote: Loneliness expresses the pain of being alone and solitude expresses the glory of being alone.
author: Paul Tillich

quote: I think Alone in the Dark was too much an action creature movie than a horror creature movie.
author: Uwe Boll

quote: To live alone is the fate of all great souls.
author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quote: Music is one of those things that make us feel a little less alone in the world.
author: Tom Cochrane

quote: A man is born alone and dies alone and he experiences the good and bad consequences of his karma alone and he goes alone to hell or the Supreme abode.
author: Chanakya

quote: I would rather be a beggar and single than a queen and married.
author: Elizabeth I

quote: Blood alone moves the wheels of history.
author: Martin Luther

quote: We are the only class in history that has been left to fight its battles alone, unaided by the ruling powers. White labor and the freed black men had their champions, but where are ours?
author: Elizabeth Cady Stanton

quote: Life could be wonderful if people would leave you alone.
author: Charlie Chaplin

quote: Reason is not automatic. Those who deny it cannot be conquered by it. Do not count on them. Leave them alone.
author: Ayn Rand

quote: Man shall not live by bread alone, but by every word that proceeds from the mouth of God.
author: Jesus Christ

quote: The light of lights looks always on the motive, not the deed, the shadow of shadows on the deed alone.
author: William Butler Yeats

quote: Not drunk is he who from the floor - Can rise alone and still drink more; But drunk is They, who prostrate lies, Without the power to drink or rise.
author: Thomas Love Peacock

quote: A human being is a single being. Unique and unrepeatable.
author: Eileen Caddy

quote: I want to be alone.
author: Greta Garbo

quote: The doer alone learneth.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: I only go out to get me a fresh appetite for being alone.
author: Lord Byron

quote: If you go long enough without a bath, even the fleas will leave you alone.
author: Ernie Pyle

quote: No man is an island. No man stands alone.
author: Dennis Brown

quote: Marriage is good for those who are afraid to sleep alone at night.
author: St. Jerome

quote: Every man is born as many men and dies as a single one.
author: Martin Heidegger

quote: One ever feels his twoness - an American, a Negro; two souls, two thoughts, two unreconciled strivings; two warring ideals in one dark body, whose dogged strength alone keeps it from being torn asunder.
author: W. E. B. Du Bois

quote: Every man must do two things alone he must do his own believing and his own dying.
author: Martin Luther

quote: Our future cannot depend on the government alone. The ultimate solutions lie in the attitudes and the actions of the American people.
author: Joe Biden

quote: Plant and your spouse plants with you weed and you weed alone.
author: Jean-Jacques Rousseau

quote: Human beings should be held accountable. Leave God alone. He has enough problems.
author: Elie Wiesel

quote: I would rather be alone and a loud voice for action than be silent.
author: Susan Rice

quote: Jealousy is no more than feeling alone against smiling enemies.
author: Elizabeth Bowen

quote: Walking with a friend in the dark is better than walking alone in the light.
author: Helen Keller

quote: Solitude is the profoundest fact of the human condition. Man is the only being who knows he is alone.
author: Octavio Paz

quote: Smile and the world smiles with you...Weep and you weep alone.
author: Jazlyn Roehl

quote: Dont be scared to walk alone. Dont be scared to like it.
author: John Mayer

quote: A man is never completely alone in this world. At the worst, he has the company of a boy, a youth, and by and by a grown man - the one he used to be.
author: Cesare Pavese

quote: What we have done for ourselves alone dies with us what we have done for others and the world remains and is immortal.
author: Albert Pike

quote: That song is a story that shows how easily you could get slipped into being labeled as the bad guy, even though what you really trying to do is tell the bad guy to leave you alone.
author: Slick Rick

quote: A leader does not deserve the name unless he is willing occasionally to stand alone.
author: Henry A. Kissinger

quote: Everything great in the world comes from neurotics. They alone have founded our religions and composed our masterpieces.
author: Marcel Proust

quote: It is strange to be known so universally and yet to be so lonely.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Industry entirely left to itself, would soon fall to ruin, and a nation letting everything alone would commit suicide.
author: Friedrich List

quote: I was never less alone than when by myself.
author: Edward Gibbon

quote: Virtue is not left to stand alone. He who practices it will have neighbors.
author: Confucius

quote: Often we can help each other most by leaving each other alone at other times we need the hand-grasp and the word of cheer.
author: Elbert Hubbard

quote: You must show him, by leaving him severely alone.
author: Charles Stewart Parnell

quote: Absolute truth belongs to Thee alone.
author: Gotthold Ephraim Lessing

quote: Id rather love a million times and have my heart broken every time than hold a permanitely empty heart forever.
author: H.C. Paye

quote: There are places and moments in which one is so completely alone that one sees the world entire.
author: Jules Renard

quote: He alone loves the Creator perfectly who manifests a pure love for his neighbor.
author: Venerable Bede

quote: Better be alone than in bad company.
author: Thomas Fuller

quote: Is it not careless to become too local when there are four hundred billion stars in our galaxy alone.
author: A. R. Ammons

quote: The strongest men are the most alone.
author: Henrik Ibsen

quote: When I walked to school in the mornings I would start out alone but would pick up four other boys along the way. We would set out together after school across the village green.
author: Roald Dahl

quote: My early childhood prepared me to be a social psychologist. I grew up in a South Bronx ghetto in a very poor family. From Sicilian origin, I was the first person in my family to complete high school, let alone go to college.
author: Philip Zimbardo

quote: It is better to be alone than in bad company.
author: George Washington

quote: I am alone, some people help me, but, basically, I can do what I want.
author: Sergei Bubka

quote: I love my government not least for the extent to which it leaves me alone.
author: John Updike

quote: For every five well-adjusted and smoothly functioning Americans, there are two who never had the chance to discover themselves. It may well be because they have never been alone with themselves.
author: Marya Mannes

quote: Grant that I may not pray alone with the mouth help me that I may pray from the depths of my heart.
author: Martin Luther

quote: Demand the ballot as the undeniable right of every man who is called to the poll, and take special care that the old constitutional rule and principle, by which majorities alone shall decide in Parliamentary elections, shall not be violated.
author: John Bright

quote: Your thoughts and emotions are yours alone.
author: John Buchanan Robinson

quote: A task becomes a duty from the moment you suspect it to be an essential part of that integrity which alone entitles a man to assume responsibility.
author: Dag Hammarskjold

quote: U2 is an original species... there are colours and feelings and emotional terrain that we occupy that is ours and ours alone.
author: Bono

quote: You are forever alone.
author: John Buchanan Robinson

quote: God writes the Gospel not in the Bible alone, but also on trees, and in the flowers and clouds and stars.
author: Martin Luther

quote: I like the idea of being alone. I like the idea of often being alone in all aspects of my life. I like to feel lonely. I like to need things.
author: Robert Plant

quote: The words of the Bible, and the Bible alone, should be heard from the pulpit.
author: Ellen G. White

quote: When the traveler goes alone he gets acquainted with himself.
author: Liberty Hyde Bailey

quote: People love pretty much the same things best. A writer looking for subjects inquires not after what he loves best, but after what he alone loves at all.
author: Annie Dillard

quote: Youre not alone there is more to this I know. You can make it out you will live to tell.
author: Saosin

quote: Let there be no mistake. A gay man alone could never begin to replicate the inner workings of the female mind.
author: Michael Patrick King

quote: Music should probably provide answers in terms of lyrical content, and giving people a sense of togetherness and oneness, as opposed to being alone in their thoughts and dilemmas or regrets or happiness or whatever.
author: Peabo Bryson

quote: The Union, which can alone insure internal peace, and external security to each State, Must and Shall be Preserved, cost what it may in time, treasure, and blood.
author: George B. McClellan

quote: You are never so alone as when you are ill on stage. The most nightmarish feeling in the world is suddenly to feel like throwing up in front of four thousand people.
author: Judy Garland

quote: Man cannot live by incompetence alone.
author: Charlotte Whitton

quote: It is a good idea to be alone in a garden at dawn or dark so that all its shy presences may haunt you and possess you in a reverie of suspended thought.
author: James Douglas

quote: For every quarrel a man and wife have before others, they have a hundred when alone.
author: E. W. Howe

quote: Our party has known great, great days. But we have no God-given right to survive, let alone to succeed.
author: Francis Maude

quote: I alone of English writers have consciously set myself to make music out of what I may call the sound of sense.
author: Robert Frost

quote: The conductor must breathe life into the score. It is you and you alone who must expose it to the understanding, reveal the hidden jewel to the sun at the most flattering angles.
author: Charles Munch

quote: Autobiography begins with a sense of being alone. It is an orphan form.
author: John Berger

quote: We need quiet time to examine our lives openly and honestly - spending quiet time alone gives your mind an opportunity to renew itself and create order.
author: Susan Taylor

quote: Remember, the burden of sorrow is doubled when it is borne alone.
author: Goran Persson

quote: I do not come bearing a party label on my sleeve - or a quick fix in my back pocket. I do not come with a rigid ideology in my heart - or a soul that tells me to go it alone. I do not come to uproot tradition - or to be imprisoned by it.
author: Ted Kulongoski

quote: I dont know why I still feel this pit in my stomach whenever I get a moment to think. I know what the pit is too I feel lonely. But Im not alone I keep telling myself.
author: Pittacus Lore

quote: If you talk to geneticists they are constantly finding that your genes are being switched on and off because of the environment. Genes alone do not determine an exact path in your life.
author: Jeffrey Eugenides

quote: Artists walk alone.
author: Ezra Miller

quote: Every government degenerates when trusted to the rulers of the people alone. The people themselves are its only safe depositories.
author: Thomas Jefferson

quote: As costs mount, in lives and dollars, it is natural to second guess, but one lesson I hope we have learned is that the U.S. cannot go it alone in a policy that leaves American troops taking all the risk and American taxpayers paying all of the costs.
author: John Spratt

quote: There is no one looking out for us. We are all alone.
author: M. Night Shyamalan

quote: Anyone who writes knows that ultimately the majority of your time is spent alone in a room with a piano or a guitar, no matter what the project is.
author: Trey Anastasio

quote: Religion is the possibility of the removal of every ground of confidence except confidence in God alone.
author: Karl Barth

quote: Success comes when people act together failure tends to happen alone.
author: Deepak Chopra

quote: Others indeed may talk, and write, and fight about liberty, and make an outward pretence to it; but the free-thinker alone is truly free.
author: George Berkeley

quote: There is a destiny which makes us brothers none goes his way alone. All that we send into the lives of others comes back into our own.
author: Edwin Markham

quote: On stage I make love to twenty five thousand people and then I go home alone.
author: Janis Joplin

quote: You cannot base a whole movie on just the imagery alone. It has to be the story and the characters.
author: John Lasseter

quote: And if you couldnt be loved the next best thing was to be let alone.
author: L.M. Montgomery

quote: You only grow when you are alone.
author: Paul Newman

quote: Testing oneself is best when done alone.
author: Jimmy Carter

quote: To stand up on a stage alone with an acoustic guitar requires bravery bordering on heroism. Bordering on insanity.
author: Richard Thompson

quote: Genius begins great works labor alone finishes them.
author: Joseph Joubert

quote: No enterprise, small or large, public or private, can remain self-governing, let alone successful, so deeply in hock to others as we are about to be.
author: Mitch Daniels

quote: It is well to be alone. It fertilizes the creative impulse.
author: Max Nordau

quote: Fear of serious injury alone cannot justify oppression of free speech and assembly. Men feared witches and burnt women. It is the function of speech to free men from the bondage of irrational fears.
author: Louis D. Brandeis

quote: Scholarship was one thing, drudgery another. I very soon concluded that nothing would induce me to read, let alone make notes on, hundreds and hundreds of very, very, very boring books.
author: Simon Raven

quote: Its better to be unhappy alone than unhappy with someone.
author: Marilyn Monroe

quote: A movie like House of the Dead with around $7 million budget or Alone in the Dark with around $16 million budget are much easier to make profit than the typical $50 million major motion picture.
author: Uwe Boll

quote: Earth teach me to forget myself as melted snow forgets its life. Earth teach me resignation as the leaves which die in the fall. Earth teach me courage as the tree which stands all alone. Earth teach me regeneration as the seed which rises in the spring.
author: William Alexander

quote: I mean Buckingham Palace has never hired a professional public relations outfit let alone a Madison Avenue type and they would throw up their hands in horror at the very idea.
author: Anthony Holden

quote: The soul that sees beauty may sometimes walk alone.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: Young people discovering their sexuality must know they walk with a strong tradition and that they are not alone. They have a right to information without being pressured.
author: Jasmine Guy

quote: No one should be left to suffer alone.
author: Daisaku Ikeda

quote: Time alone reveals the just man but you might discern a bad man in a single day.
author: Sophocles

quote: It is a great mystery that though the human heart longs for Truth, in which alone it finds liberation and delight, the first reaction of human beings to Truth is one of hostility and fear!
author: Anthony De Mello

quote: if you wanted to do something absolutely honest something true it always turned out to be a thing that had to be done alone.
author: Richard Yates

quote: I think the greatest amount of pressure is the pressure I place on myself. So in a way I chose to be alone.
author: Cathy Freeman

quote: He never is alone that is accompanied with noble thoughts.
author: John Fletcher

quote: A man content to go to heaven alone will never go to heaven.
author: Boethius

quote: Golf... is the infallible test. The man who can go into a patch of rough alone, with the knowledge that only God is watching him, and play his ball where it lies, is the man who will serve you faithfully and well.
author: P. G. Wodehouse

quote: But no nation can base its survival and development on luck and prayers alone while its leadership fritters away every available opportunity for success and concrete achievement.
author: Ibrahim Babangida

quote: I am lost without you. I am soulless a drifter without a home a solitary bird in a flight to nowhere. I am all these things and I am nothing at all. This my darling is my life without you. I long for you to show me how to live again.
author: Nicholas Sparks

quote: In the laughing times we know that we are lucky, and in the quiet times we know that we are blessed. And we will not be alone.
author: Dar Williams

quote: I am alone here in New York, no longer a we.
author: Elizabeth Hardwick

quote: No harm comes to man from outside alone: dumbness is the objective spirit.
author: Theodor Adorno

quote: No One Is Alone by Stephen Sondheim is all about thinking for yourself and being your own person.
author: Bernadette Peters

quote: No man is an island. No man stands alone.
author: Dennis Brown

quote: The best of artists has no conception that the marble alone does not contain within itself.
author: Michelangelo

quote: After all my various relationships I find myself now home alone.
author: Francesca Annis

quote: I prefer to work alone and do everything alone, even today.
author: Ray Harryhausen

quote: An American, a Negro... two souls, two thoughts, two unreconciled strivings; two warring ideals in one dark body, whose dogged strength alone keeps it from being torn asunder.
author: W. E. B. Du Bois

quote: I grew up in a very large family in a very small house. I never slept alone until after I was married.
author: Lewis Grizzard

quote: From Nelson county we went to Logan county to see some relatives we had there, and after staying until the middle of October, I returned alone to my home in Missouri.
author: Jesse James

quote: Nothing makes us so lonely as our secrets.
author: Paul Tournier

quote: Nothing in this world can take the place of persistence. Talent will not nothing is more common than unsuccessful people with talent. Genius will not unrewarded genius is almost a proverb. Education will not the world is full of educated failures. Persistence and determination alone are omnipotent.
author: Calvin Coolidge

quote: The U.S. cannot go it alone simply when it is convenient.
author: Susan Rice

quote: Being alone is very difficult.
author: Yoko Ono

quote: Justice cannot be for one side alone, but must be for both.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: He alone is free who lives with free consent under the entire guidance of reason.
author: Baruch Spinoza

quote: She had the kids during the day and I would have them at night. That way they were never alone. I would put the kids to bed, and then I had nothing to do and nobody to talk to, so I would write.
author: Clive Cussler

quote: Lucy seemed to be imprisoned by a legion of people in her life who always wanted what was right for her. And as a result in the eyes of everyone she had everything... and yet she always always felt she had nothing. No one.
author: C. JoyBell C.

quote: Even though I love solar and love wind, like most people do, I like the renewable sources, they alone are not going to get America energy independent.
author: Mitt Romney

quote: The music industry is a strange combination of having real and intangible assets: pop bands are brand names in themselves, and at a given stage in their careers their name alone can practically gaurantee hit records.
author: Richard Branson

quote: You come into the world alone and you go out of the world alone yet it seems to me you are more alone while living than even going and coming.
author: Emily Carr

quote: Thank you for leaving us alone but giving us enough attention to boost our egos.
author: Mick Jagger

quote: Health consists with temperance alone.
author: Alexander Pope

quote: The population forecast for the United States in 1970 is 170 million. The population forecast for Russia alone in 1970 is 251 million. The implications are clear.
author: Emanuel Celler

quote: I once asked a hermit in Italy how he could venture to live alone, in a single cottage, on the top of a mountain, a mile from any habitation? He replied, that Providence was his next-door neighbor.
author: Laurence Sterne

quote: I cannot live under pressures from patrons, let alone paint.
author: Michelangelo

quote: Absolutely lonely people have few personal interactions of any kind.
author: Martha Beck

quote: A well-instructed people alone can be permanently a free people.
author: James Madison

quote: Everyones moving on without me into a world I dont understand.
author: Sophie Kinsella

quote: It is great folly to wish to be wise all alone.
author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quote: We are so bound together that no man can labor for himself alone. Each blow he strikes in his own behalf helps to mold the universe.
author: Jerome K. Jerome

quote: This is nourishing, redemptive; we become less alone inside.
author: David Foster Wallace

quote: Some people can sometimes really invade your space and kind of never leave you alone.
author: Julia Louis-Dreyfus

quote: Observe, record, tabulate, communicate. Use your five senses. Learn to see, learn to hear, learn to feel, learn to smell, and know that by practice alone you can become expert.
author: William Osler

quote: We are rarely proud when we are alone.
author: Voltaire

quote: Events alone rarely provide much guide to the future.
author: Walter Lord

quote: If you make friends with yourself you will never be alone.
author: Maxwell Maltz

quote: Lingering is so very lonely when one lingers all alone.
author: Mervyn Peake

quote: Still, intuitive assumptions about behavior is only the starting point of systematic analysis, for alone they do not yield many interesting implications.
author: Gary Becker

quote: In the first 50 years of the filibuster, it was used only 35 times. But the last Congress alone had 112 cloture motions filed, plus threats of more. This is the tyranny of the minority.
author: Peter Fenn

quote: The person who tries to live alone will not succeed as a human being. His heart withers if it does not answer another heart. His mind shrinks away if he hears only the echoes of his own thoughts and finds no other inspiration.
author: Pearl S. Buck

quote: To Follow by faith alone is to follow blindly.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: People used what they called a telephone because they hated being close together and they were scared of being alone.
author: Chuck Palahniuk

quote: In Arkansas alone, approximately three quarters of a million people are at risk of going hungry, and one in four children does not get enough to eat, so my goal is to bring awareness to this tragic issue.
author: Blanche Lincoln

quote: Id never chosen to be alone but that was the way things had turned out and Id grown used to it.
author: Sebastian Faulks

quote: In the country of pain we are each alone.
author: May Sarton

quote: Alone we can do so little together we can do so much.
author: Helen Keller

quote: The only real progress lies in learning to be wrong all alone.
author: Albert Camus

quote: The prospect of success in achieving our most cherished dream is not without its terrors. Who is more deprived and alone than the man who has achieved his dream?
author: Brendan Francis

quote: Now suddenly there was nothing but a world of cloud, and we three were there alone in the middle of a great white plain with snowy hills and mountains staring at us; and it was very still; but there were whispers.
author: Black Elk

quote: The belief in a supernatural source of evil is not necessary men alone are quite capable of every wickedness.
author: Joseph Conrad

quote: You who choose to lead must follow. But if you fall, you fall alone.
author: Robert Hunter

quote: Your life is yours and yours alone. Rise up and live it.
author: Terry Goodkind

quote: It is far better to be alone, than to be in bad company.
author: George Washington

quote: I have noticed... that men usually leave married women alone and are inclined to treat all wives with respect. This is no great credit to married women.
author: Marilyn Monroe

quote: I love the way you can fall in love with a piece of literature how words alone can get your heart doing that.
author: Laura Marling

quote: I have my best ideas when I am alone.
author: Leona Lewis

quote: It is astonishing how little one feels alone when one loves.
author: John Bulwer

quote: The foolish and the dead alone never change their opinions.
author: James Russell Lowell

quote: But, if you observe children learning in their first few years of life, you can see that they can and do learn on their own - we leave them alone to crawl, walk, talk, and gain control over their bodies. It happens without much help from parents.
author: Daniel Greenberg

quote: Highly educated young people are tutored, taught and monitored in all aspects of their lives, except the most important, which is character building. When it comes to this, most universities leave them alone.
author: David Brooks

quote: Whatever my individual desires were to be free, I was not alone. There were many others who felt the same way.
author: Rosa Parks

quote: People just dont seem to get me. Dont understand that I need my space. Always telling me what to do. They think rules and routines and clean hands and your ps and qs will make everything all right. They havent got a clue.
author: Rachel Ward

quote: Let me alone, and go in search of someone else.
author: Ali ibn Abi Talib

quote: I just let the pain take over allowing it to numb the pain of being left behind.
author: Jessica Sorensen

quote: A career is all very well, but no one lives by work alone.
author: Lorna Luft

quote: Only the lonely know the way I feel tonight.
author: Roy Orbison

quote: I like the idea of being alone. I like the idea of often being alone in all aspects of my life. I like to feel lonely. I like to need things.
author: Robert Plant

quote: There is no end to the violations committed by children on children, quietly talking alone.
author: Elizabeth Bowen

quote: I always try hard to arrange all media in a way so that it expresses what I want - this is not limited to one medium alone and varies from case to case.
author: Alva Noto

quote: There are people who like to be alone without feeling lonely at all.
author: Toba Beta

quote: For your sake I hurry over land and waterFor your sake I cross the desert and split the mountain in twoAnd I turn my face from all thingsUntil the time I reach the placeWhere I am alone with you.
author: Al Hallaj

quote: As regards parents, I should like to see them as highly educated as possible, and I do not restrict this remark to fathers alone.
author: Quintilian

quote: To awaken quite alone in a strange town is one of the pleasantest sensations in the world.
author: Freya Stark

quote: If those committed to the quest fail, they will be forgiven. When lost, they will find another way. The moral imperative of humanism is the endeavor alone, whether successful or not, provided the effort is honorable and failure memorable.
author: E. O. Wilson

quote: I would hope that understanding and reconciliation are not limited to the 19th hole alone.
author: Gerald R. Ford

quote: Better be alone than in bad company.
author: Thomas Fuller

quote: Dont you think it would be wonderful to get rid of everything and everybody and just go somewhere where you dont know a soul
author: Haruki Murakami

quote: Man cannot live by bread alone he must have peanut butter.
author: James A. Garfield

quote: I paint self-portraits because I am so often alone, because I am the person I know best.
author: Frida Kahlo

quote: I never did anything alone. Whatever was accomplished in this country was accomplished collectively.
author: Golda Meir

quote: We are not to give credit to the many, who say that none ought to be educated but the free; but rather to the philosophers, who say that the well-educated alone are free.
author: Epictetus

quote: I cant imagine what my life was before. I cant imagine ever being without you for very long again.
author: Anna Godbersen

quote: Living alone makes it harder to find someone to blame.
author: Mason Cooley

quote: As freak legislation, the antitrust laws stand alone. Nobody knows what it is they forbid.
author: Isabel Paterson

quote: A steady patriot of the world alone, The friend of every country but his own.
author: George Canning

quote: I would always be lonely but no more alone.
author: Sonya Hartnett

quote: Photography can never grow up if it imitates some other medium. It has to walk alone it has to be itself.
author: Berenice Abbott

quote: The next thing I wrote was in a writing class at night school. It was about a poor woman who worked at a dime store and who was all alone for Christmas in Laurel, Mississippi.
author: Beth Henley

quote: No harm comes to man from outside alone: dumbness is the objective spirit.
author: Theodor Adorno

quote: The time you spend alone with God will transform your character and increase your devotion. Then your integrity and godly behavior in an unbelieving world will make others long to know the Lord.
author: Charles Stanley

quote: My kitchen linoleum is so black and shiny that I waltz while I wait for the kettle to boil. This pleasure is for the old who live alone.
author: Florida Scott-Maxwell

quote: From childhoods hour I have not beenAs others were I have not seenAs others saw
author: Edgar Allan Poe

quote: I was very happy sitting alone at a dining room table, writing a script.
author: Conrad Hall

quote: Alone I often fall down into nothingness. I must push my foot stealthily lest I should fall off the edge of the world into nothingness. I have to bang my head against some hard door to call myself back to the body.
author: Virginia Woolf

quote: I love nicknames. It makes me feel loved. It makes me feel less alone in this world.
author: Ellen Page

quote: Every animal leaves traces of what it was man alone leaves traces of what he created.
author: Jacob Bronowski

quote: Judaism is much more communal, and partly as a consequence of my religious switch, I am increasingly more suspicous of my previous view that what people do in the privacy of their own home is their business alone.
author: Luke Ford

quote: The artist alone sees spirits. But after he has told of their appearing to him, everybody sees them.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: I live to hail that season by gifted one foretold, when men shall live by reason, and not alone by gold.
author: George Linnaeus Banks

quote: The only people who like to live alone more than comics are priests.
author: Colin Quinn

quote: A movie like House of the Dead with around $7 million budget or Alone in the Dark with around $16 million budget are much easier to make profit than the typical $50 million major motion picture.
author: Uwe Boll

quote: U2 is an original species... there are colours and feelings and emotional terrain that we occupy that is ours and ours alone.
author: Bono

quote: Even crushed against his brother in the Tube the average Englishman pretends desperately that he is alone.
author: Germaine Greer

quote: I feel so good after a workout. Any time you can be alone with yourself is really important.
author: Shay Mitchell

quote: It is the fight alone that pleases us, not the victory.
author: Blaise Pascal

quote: I have so many different personalities in me and I still feel lonely.
author: Tori Amos

quote: European investment in Texas alone exceeds all U.S. investment in China and Japan put together.
author: John Bruton

quote: He travels the fastest who travels alone.
author: Rudyard Kipling

quote: Iran has long sponsored terrorists who carry out homicide bombings in Israeli cities. However, it is a mistake to believe the danger Iran poses is directed at Israel alone.
author: John Doolittle

quote: Loneliness is a state of feeling that can be changed.People may still feel lonely even among the crowd.
author: Toba Beta

quote: Unless we love and are loved, each of us is alone, each of us is deeply lonely.
author: Mortimer Adler

quote: It is error alone which needs the support of government. Truth can stand by itself.
author: Thomas Jefferson

quote: No individual is alone responsible for a single stepping stone along the path of progress, and where the path is smooth progress is most rapid.
author: Ernest Lawrence

quote: Adems no es tan malo vivir solo. Yo la paso bien decidiendo a cada instante lo que quiero hacer y gracias a la soledad me conozco algo fundamental para vivir
author: Facundo Cabral

quote: To be adult is to be alone.
author: Jean Rostand

quote: Our language has wisely sensed the two sides of being alone. It has created the word loneliness to express the pain of being alone. And it has created the word solitude to express the glory of being alone.
author: Paul Tillich

quote: The most boring scenes are the scenes where a character is alone.
author: Chuck Palahniuk

quote: I feel less alone when I read the books of Ratzinger.
author: Oriana Fallaci

quote: Schizophrenia beats dining alone.
author: Oscar Levant

quote: I just want to feel like home. I just want Rosabelle. My other half. Where she was day I was night. While I was earth she was sky. Dreams Smiles and Bloody Tears
author: Chamera Sampson

quote: That we find a crystal or a poppy beautiful means that we are less alone, that we are more deeply inserted into existence than the course of a single life would lead us to believe.
author: John Berger

quote: Even in the presence of others he was completely alone.
author: Robert M. Pirsig

quote: Better mad with the rest of the world than wise alone.
author: Baltasar Gracian

quote: Captain Hale, alone, without sympathy or support, save that from above, on the near approach of death asked for a clergyman to attend him. It was refused. He then requested a Bible; that too was refused by his inhuman jailer.
author: William Hull

quote: We are ultimately alone in that we are ultimately responsible for ourselves.
author: Robert Zemeckis

quote: Reason is not automatic. Those who deny it cannot be conquered by it. Do not count on them. Leave them alone.
author: Ayn Rand

quote: I think Mr. Wilson will have to be the rest of the way alone.
author: Flip Wilson

quote: What a lovely surprise to finally discover how unlonely being alone can be.
author: Ellen Burstyn

quote: A hospital alone shows what war is.
author: Erich Maria Remarque

quote: Successful crimes alone are justified.
author: John Dryden

quote: Wisdom alone is the science of other sciences.
author: Plato

quote: Buddhism notes that it is always a mistake to think your soul can go it alone.
author: Annie Dillard

quote: In Genesis, it says that it is not good for a man to be alone; but sometimes it is a great relief.
author: John Barrymore

quote: The answer, of course, in the mouth of a Christian teacher is that in Christianity alone is there both present joy and future hope.
author: Mary Augusta Ward

quote: I think its good for a person to spend time alone. It gives them an opportunity to discover who they are and to figure out why they are always alone.
author: Amy Sedaris

quote: To really be centered and to really work well and to think about the kinds of things that I need to think about, I need to spend large amounts of time alone.
author: Donna Tartt

quote: The power that is supported by force alone will have cause often to tremble.
author: Lajos Kossuth

quote: Wisdom is not wisdom when it is derived from books alone.
author: Horace

quote: The man of genius is he and he alone who finds such joy in his art that he will work at it come hell or high water.
author: Stendhal

quote: The lonely become either thoughtful or empty.
author: Mason Cooley

quote: When we dream alone it is only a dream, but when many dream together it is the beginning of a new reality.
author: Friedensreich Hundertwasser

quote: Compassion alone stands apart from the continuous traffic between good and evil proceeding within us.
author: Eric Hoffer

quote: The doer alone learneth.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: I was a queen, and you took away my crown; a wife, and you killed my husband; a mother, and you deprived me of my children. My blood alone remains: take it, but do not make me suffer long.
author: Marie Antoinette

quote: Who knows what true loneliness is - not the conventional word but the naked terror? To the lonely themselves it wears a mask. The most miserable outcast hugs some memory or some illusion.
author: Joseph Conrad

quote: Man cannot live by incompetence alone.
author: Charlotte Whitton

quote: When you work alone, you need to socialize at some level.
author: Jeffery Deaver

quote: Our country will, I believe, sooner forgive an officer for attacking an enemy than for letting it alone.
author: Horatio Nelson

quote: The man who goes alone can start today but he who travels with another must wait till that other is ready.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: President Johnson did not want the Vietnam War to broaden. He wanted the North Vietnamese to leave their brothers in the South alone.
author: William Westmoreland

quote: I had a fear of being alone.
author: Gloria Gaynor

quote: If I have the choice of traveling to Russia, India or New Zealand alone for a week for preliminary discussions or to spend that week with my family, I routinely choose my family.
author: Olafur Eliasson

quote: The White House alone cannot hold its opponents accountable.
author: Paul Weyrich

quote: He who does not fill his world with phantoms remains alone.
author: Antonio Porchia

quote: Do not whine... Do not complain. Work harder. Spend more time alone.
author: Joan Didion

quote: For each one of us stands alone in the midst of a universe.
author: John Buchanan Robinson

quote: All of our unhappiness comes from our inability to be alone.
author: Jean de la Bruyere

quote: Writers may be disreputable, incorrigible, early to decay or late to bloom but they dare to go it alone.
author: John Updike

quote: Is he alone who has courage on his right hand and faith on his left hand?
author: Charles Lindbergh

quote: The intrusions of the white race and the non- compliance with treaty obligations have been followed by atrocities that could alone satisfy a savage and revengeful spirit.
author: Nelson A. Miles

quote: I am alone I am always alone no matter what.
author: Marilyn Monroe

quote: When everything is lonely I can be my best friend.
author: Conor Oberst

quote: Solitude is strength to depend on the presence of the crowd is weakness. The man who needs a mob to nerve him is much more alone than he imagines.
author: Paul Brunton

quote: Just remember, you are not alone, in fact you are in a very common place with millions of others. We need to help each other and keep striving to reach our goals.
author: Mike Moreno

quote: There is a certain strength in being alone.
author: Heather Duffy Stone

quote: Everything hurt. I closed my eyes pressing my cheek to the street and waited. What for I didnt know. To be rescued. Or found. But no one came. All Id ever thought I wanted was to be left alone. Until I was.
author: Sarah Dessen

quote: Between 1910 and 1950 approximately 350 lives of Jesus were published in the English language alone.
author: John Clayton

quote: It was at that moment he realized that his spirit was truly human once more. For he no longer remembered how to be alone without being lonely.
author: Neal Shusterman

quote: Work alone is noble.
author: Thomas Carlyle

quote: I knew I was alone in a way that no earthling has ever been before.
author: Michael Collins

quote: It is very frightening to feel alone when you are standing against a rich and powerful person and all his attendant helpers.
author: Gloria Allred

quote: Over the years I have been kind of lazy, thinking my talent alone can do it.
author: Asafa Powell

quote: Associate with men of good quality if you esteem your own reputation for it is better to be alone than in bad company.
author: George Washington

quote: Costumes and scenery alone will not attract audiences.
author: Anna Held

quote: Nothing is worse than being alone on the evening of the day when ones cow has exploded.
author: Dean Koontz

quote: Victims always feel alone and helpless.
author: Deepak Chopra

quote: Change alone is unchanging.
author: Heraclitus

quote: Time and space - time to be alone, space to move about - these may well become the great scarcities of tomorrow.
author: Edwin Way Teale

quote: Work, apart from devotion or love of God, is helpless and cannot stand alone.
author: Ramakrishna

quote: We perceive when love begins and when it declines by our embarrassment when alone together.
author: Jean de la Bruyere

quote: A man can be himself only so long as he is alone.
author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quote: I only had the right to sit in the shadows of the worldin complete silence. Whether I was laughed at or told I was discusting or thought of as unpleasant I would sit in the shadows.
author: Novala Takemoto

quote: I rise to taste the dawn, and find that love alone will shine today.
author: Ken Wilber

quote: The employee is regarded by the employer merely in the light of his value as an operative. His productive capacity alone is taken into account.
author: Leland Stanford

quote: In this world there are things you can only do alone and things you can only do with somebody else. Its important to combine the two in just the right amount
author: Haruki Murakami

quote: All of a sudden I didnt fit in anywhere. Not at school not at home...and every time I turned around another person Id known forever felt like a stranger to me. Even I felt like a stranger to me.
author: Wendelin Van Draanen

quote: As long as my sixth graders showed an average improvement of five years, the principal and district pretty much left me alone to create my own curriculum and teach whatever I wanted.
author: Dan Simmons

quote: I could prove God statistically. Take the human body alone - the chances that all the functions of an individual would just happen is a statistical monstrosity.
author: George Gallup

quote: Friends are very important to me, and I have always had many of them. There are probably many reasons why this is so, but two seem to me more valid than any of the others I am a naturally friendly person, and I hate to be alone.
author: Georg Solti

quote: I felt alone out there, like I was on a desert island. I felt like Gilligan.
author: Mickey Rivers

quote: I meddled in things that man must leave alone.
author: R. C. Sherriff

quote: The right to be let alone is indeed the beginning of all freedoms.
author: William O. Douglas

quote: If the First Amendment means anything, it means that a state has no business telling a man, sitting alone in his house, what books he may read or what films he may watch.
author: Thurgood Marshall

quote: The trouble is not really in being alone its being lonely. One can be lonely in the midst of a crowd dont you think
author: Christine Feehan

quote: What good is sitting all alone in your room?
author: Liza Minnelli

quote: It is my personality alone that has brought back the waltz and made it a global craze.
author: Andre Rieu

quote: Im all you have in this world Mariam and when Im gone youll have nothing. You ARE nothing
author: Khaled Hosseini

quote: Taste is the fundamental quality which sums up all the other qualities. It is the nec plus ultra of the intelligence. Through this alone is genius the supreme health and balance of all the faculties.
author: Isidore Ducasse Lautreamont

quote: Everybody is a stranger but thats the danger in going my own way.
author: John Mayer

quote: Looking back on those games, I probably hustled out of position as much as I hustled into position since I really never had any real training. I was working on instincts alone.
author: Jim Evans

quote: Being a child at home alone in the summer is a high-risk occupation. If you call your mother at work thirteen times an hour, she can hurt you.
author: Erma Bombeck

quote: The world is full of fools; and he who would not wish to see one, must not only shut himself up alone, but must also break his looking-glass.
author: Nicolas Boileau

quote: Fear is that thing that keeps you up there on that other plateau. Fear is that thing that just keeps you closed down, and quite frankly, alone.
author: Andrew Shue

quote: Simply by not owning three medium-sized castles in Tuscany I have saved enough money in the last forty years on insurance premiums alone to buy a medium-sized castle in Tuscany.
author: Ludwig Mies van der Rohe

quote: Myspace alone has just over 80 million users and ranks as the sixth most popular English language website and the eighth most popular site in the world.
author: Mike Fitzpatrick

quote: The only time I commit to conspiracy theories is when something way retarded happens. Like Lee Harvey Oswald acting alone.
author: Joe Rogan

quote: All we ask is to be let alone.
author: Jefferson Davis

quote: And the danger is that in this move toward new horizons and far directions that I may lose what I have now and not find anything except loneliness
author: Sylvia Plath

quote: After all its one thing to run away when someones chasing you. Its entirely another to be running all alone.
author: Jennifer E. Smith

quote: I must try and break through the cliches about Latin America. Superpowers and other outsiders have fought over us for centuries in ways that have nothing to do with our problems. In reality we are all alone.
author: Gabriel Garcia Marquez

quote: Wisdom comes alone through suffering.
author: Aeschylus

quote: Love alone could waken love.
author: Pearl S. Buck

quote: Feeling someone elses anger is bad being left alone is worse.
author: David Levithan

quote: ...each of us from the seance stood alone. Like so many pillars of salt we had tried to look back and failed. And in the eyes of the others who shared the pale flat sky with us there was sometimes suspicion sometimes a little fear.
author: Joan Lowery Nixon

quote: The difference between the denominational system and the public school system is all the difference between bolstering them up on the one hand and letting them alone of the other.
author: Edmund Barton

quote: Work alone will efface the footsteps of work.
author: James Whistler

quote: No woman has to be a victim of physical abuse. Women have to feel like they are not alone.
author: Salma Hayek

quote: Getting through the nights is the toughest part. Being alone. Not having her there to talk to.
author: Stuart Appleby

quote: How terrible would it be to just wait there pathetically alone for him never to show upEudoxias expression grew more serious. Thats what youre doing anyway my dear.
author: Ann Brashares

quote: Septimus has been working too hard  that was all she could say to her own mother. To love makes one solitary she thought.
author: Virginia Woolf

quote: If you make friends with yourself youll never be alone.
author: Maxwell Maltz

quote: Love is our true destiny. We do not find the meaning of life by ourselves alone - we find it with another.
author: Thomas Merton

quote: For the first time, I lived alone... in a luxury apartment on Sunset Strip. For a few days I loved the idea, but I got lonely and restless.
author: Patty Duke

quote: It would do the world good if every man would compel himself occasionally to be absolutely alone. Most of the world s progress has come out of such loneliness.
author: Bruce Barton

quote: I had been alone more than I could have been had I gone by myself.
author: Sylvia Plath

quote: Inside myself is a place where I live all alone and that is where I renew my springs that never dry up.
author: Pearl S. Buck
